question: I have been intrested in native american cultures most of my life.And I married a man 1/4 Ute.Anyway I am having numbness and tingling.Since my doctors took me off all my medications(27 in all). a couple days later came came the numbness.And now numbness and tingleing.In hands feet and kegs,My doctor is giving me neurontin.And it doesn't help much.Any ideas?I have been a diabetec for about 8 years.I keep control of my sugars.And had no complications untill they took away my meds.The bad thing is now I have half of them back.Could the diabetes plus them taking my meds away cause this?
title: Are there any native American  prescriptions for numbness and tingling
